atk-s0515a0:5_0: Bhāventaṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ, phusi yo amataṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0515a0:11_0: Saṁkhittena hi yo vuttaṁ, dhammacakkaṁ vibhāgaso.
atk-s0515a0:21_0: Avokkamento samayaṁ sakañca, anāmasanto samayaṁ parañca;
atk-s0515a0:24_0: Atthaṁ apubbaṁ anuvaṇṇayanto, suttañca yuttiñca anukkamento.
atk-s0515a0:28_0: Sakkacca saddhammapajotikaṁ taṁ, suṇātha dhāretha ca sādhu santoti.
atk-s0515a0:29_0: Tattha “pāṭho visiṭṭho niddeso, taṁnāmavisesito cā”ti vuttattā duvidho pāṭho –
atk-s0515a0:29_4: Tattha tīsu dvāresu parisuddhapayogabhāvena visuddhakaruṇānaṁ cittena pavattitadesanā vācāhi akathitattā adesitattā akkharamiti saññitā, taṁ pārāyanikabrāhmaṇānaṁ manasā pucchitapañhānaṁ vasena bhagavatā ratanaghare nisīditvā sammasitapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇavasena ca akkharaṁ nāmāti gahetabbaṁ.
atk-s0515a0:30_0: Atha vā aparipuṇṇaṁ padaṁ akkharamiti gahetabbaṁ “saṭṭhivassasahassānī”ti evamādīsu viya.
atk-s0515a0:30_1: Ettha hi sakāra nakāra sokārādīni akkharamiti, ekakkharaṁ vā padaṁ akkharamiti eke.
atk-s0515a0:30_2: “Yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobhavikā”ti evamādīsu vibhatyantaṁ atthajotakaṁ akkharapiṇḍaṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0515a0:30_3: “Nāmañca rūpañcā”ti evamādīsu bahuakkharehi yuttaṁ padaṁ nāma.
atk-s0515a0:30_5: Padena abhihitaṁ byañjayati byattaṁ pākaṭaṁ karotīti byañjanaṁ, vākyameva.
atk-s0515a0:30_8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti.
atk-s0515a0:30_12: Yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā”ti evamādīsu kathitabyañjanaṁ anekavidhena vibhāgakaraṇaṁ ākāro nāma.
atk-s0515a0:30_15: Vediyatīti vedanā”ti nīharitvā vacanaṁ nirutti nāma.
atk-s0515a0:30_16: Nibbacanavitthāro nissesato desoti niddeso, vediyatīti vedanāti nibbacanaladdhapadaṁ “sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhā, sukhayatīti sukhā, dukkhayatīti dukkhā, neva dukkhayati na sukhayatīti adukkhamasukhā”ti atthavitthāro niravasesena kathitattā niddeso nāma.
atk-s0515a0:31_0: Evaṁ chabbidhāni byañjanapadāni jānitvā ca chasu atthapadesu saṅkhepato kāsanā dīpanā saṅkāsanā, “maññamāno kho, bhikkhu, bandho mārassa amaññamāno mutto pāpimato”ti evamādīsu saṅkhepena atthadīpanā saṅkāsanā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:31_1: Eso pana thero “buddhena bhagavatā evaṁ saṅkhepaṁ katvā vuttamatthaṁ ‘aññātaṁ bhagavā, aññātaṁ sugatā”’ti kathetuṁ samattho paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0515a0:32_0: Upari vattabbamatthaṁ ādito kāsanā dīpanā pakāsanā, “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, āditta”nti evamādīsu pacchā kathitabbamatthaṁ paṭhamavacanena dīpanā pakāsanā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:32_1: Evaṁ paṭhamaṁ dīpitaṁ atthaṁ puna pākaṭaṁ katvā dīpanena “kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṁ ādittaṁ?
atk-s0515a0:32_2: Cakkhuṁ, bhikkhave, ādittaṁ, rūpā ādittā”ti evamādīsu kathitesu “tikkhindriyo saṅkhepena vuttaṁ paṭivijjhatī”ti kathitattā dve atthapadāni tikkhindriyassa upakāravasena vuttāni.
atk-s0515a0:33_0: Saṁkhittassa vitthārābhidhānaṁ sakiṁ vuttassa ca punapi abhidhānaṁ vivaraṇaṁ, “kusalā dhammā”ti saṅkhepena nikkhittassa.
atk-s0515a0:33_2: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hotī”ti niddesavasena vitthāraṇaṁ vitthāravasena puna kathanaṁ vivaraṇaṁ nāma.
atk-s0515a0:34_0: Taṁ vibhāgakaraṇaṁ vibhajanaṁ, “yasmiṁ samaye”ti vivarite kusale dhamme “tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hotī”ti vibhāgakaraṇaṁ vibhajanaṁ nāma.
atk-s0515a0:34_1: Vivarassa vitthārābhidhānena vibhattassa ca upamābhidhānena paṭipādanaṁ uttānīkaraṇaṁ, vivaraṇena vivaritatthassa “katamo tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti?
atk-s0515a0:34_2: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā”ti ativivaritvā kathanañca vibhajanena vibhattassa “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā, evameva khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, phassāhāro daṭṭhabboti vadāmī”ti evamādiupamākathanañca uttānīkaraṇaṁ nāma.
atk-s0515a0:34_3: Dhammaṁ suṇantānaṁ dhammadesanena cittassa anekavidhena somanassauppādanañca atikhiṇabuddhīnaṁ anekavidhena ñāṇassa tikhiṇabhāvakaraṇañca paññatti nāma, tesaṁ suṇantānaṁ taṁcittatosanena taṁcittanisāmanena ca paññāyatīti paññatti.
atk-s0515a0:34_4: Tattha bhagavā akkharehi saṅkāsayati, padehi pakāsayati, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi uttānīkaroti, niddesehi paññāpayatīti.
atk-s0515a0:34_6: Buddhā bhagavanto ekacce veneyye ekasmiṁ desane akkharehi atthasaṅkāsanaṁ karonti…pe…
atk-s0515a0:35_0: Atha vā akkharehi saṅkāsayitvā padehi pakāsayati, byañjanehi vivaritvā ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi uttānīkatvā niddesehi paññāpayati.
atk-s0515a0:35_2: Evarūpena dhammadesanena ekaccesu ṭhānesu ekaccānaṁ veneyyānaṁ vinayatīti.
atk-s0515a0:36_0: Atha vā akkharehi ugghāṭayitvā padehi pakāsento vinayati ugghaṭitaññuṁ, byañjanehi vivaritvā ākārehi vibhajanto vinayati vipañcitaññuṁ, niruttīhi uttānīkatvā niddesehi paññāpento vinayati neyyaṁ.
atk-s0515a0:37_0: Atthato panettha katamo byañjanapāṭho, katamo atthapāṭhoti?
atk-s0515a0:37_1: Buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ dhammaṁ desentānaṁ yo atthāvagamako saviññattikasaddo, so byañjanapāṭho.
atk-s0515a0:37_2: Yo tena abhisametabbo lakkhaṇarasādisahito dhammo, so atthapāṭhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:37_3: Punapi sandhāyabhāsito byañjanabhāsito sāvasesapāṭho anavasesapāṭho nīto neyyoti chabbidho pāṭho.
atk-s0515a0:37_4: Tattha anekatthavattā sandhāyabhāsito “mātaraṁ pitaraṁ hantvā, rājāno dve ca khattiye”ti evamādi.
atk-s0515a0:37_7: Viparīto anavaseso “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṁ āgacchantī”ti evamādi.
atk-s0515a0:37_8: Yathā vacanaṁ, tathā avagantabbo nīto “aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ anattā”ti evamādi.
atk-s0515a0:38_0: Attho pana anekappakāro pāṭhattho sabhāvattho ñāyattho pāṭhānurūpo napāṭhānurūpo sāvasesattho niravasesattho nītattho neyyattho iccādi.
atk-s0515a0:38_1: Tattha yo appassatthassa ñāpanatthamuccāriyate, so pāṭhattho “sātthaṁ sabyañjana”ntiādīsu viya.
atk-s0515a0:38_3: Yo ñāyamāno hitāya saṁvattati, so ñātuṁ arahatīti ñāyattho –
atk-s0515a0:38_5: Yathāpāṭhaṁ bhāsito pāṭhānurūpo “cakkhu, bhikkhave, purāṇakamma”nti bhagavatā vuttaṁ.
atk-s0515a0:38_7: Byañjanacchāyāya atthaṁ paṭibāhayamānena vutto attho napāṭhānurūpo, so pāṭhato ananuññāto akatapaṭikkhepo viyutto.
atk-s0515a0:38_8: So ca saṅgahetabbampi asaṅgahetvā, parivajjetabbampi vā kiñci aparivajjetvā parisesaṁ katvā vutto sāvasesattho “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ.
atk-s0515a0:38_9: Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0515a0:38_11: Tatra, bhikkhave, ko mantā ko saddhātā…pe…
atk-s0515a0:38_13: Saddavaseneva veditabbo nītattho “rūpā saddā rasā gandhā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0515a0:38_14: Sammutivasena veditabbo neyyattho “cattārome, bhikkhave, valāhakūpamā puggalā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0515a0:38_15: Evamidha pāṭhañca atthañca vivaritvā ṭhito asaṁhīro bhavati paravādīhi dīgharattaṁ titthavāsena.
atk-s0515a0:39_0: Iti asaṁhīrabhāvena yāva āgamādhigamasampadaṁ, tāva vattuṁ sakkoti.
atk-s0515a0:39_2: Evaṁvidho attānañca parañca sodhetuṁ samatthabhāvena dussīlyadiṭṭhimalavirahitattā suci.
atk-s0515a0:39_3: Dussīlo hi attānaṁ upahanati, tena nādeyyavāco ca bhavati sabyohāramāno idha niccāturo vejjova.
atk-s0515a0:39_4: Duddiṭṭhi paraṁ upahanati, nāvassayo ca bhavati vāḷagahākulo iva kamalasaṇḍo.
atk-s0515a0:39_5: Ubhayavipanno pana sabbathāpi anupāsanīyo bhavati gūthagatamiva chavālātaṁ gūthagato viya ca kaṇhasappo.
atk-s0515a0:39_6: Ubhayasampanno pana sabbathāpi upāsanīyo sevitabbo ca viññūhi, nirupaddavo iva ratanākaro, evaṁ bhūto evaṁ amaccharo ahīnācariyamuṭṭhi.
atk-s0515a0:42_1: Tato eva sotūnaṁ hite niyuttattā nesaṁ avabodhanaṁ pati akilāsu bhavatīti.
atk-s0515a0:45_0: Ettha desakassāti desako assa, bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0515a0:45_2: So eso sucittā piyo, catunnaṁ apariccāgittā garu, asaṁhīrattā bhāvanīyo, desakattā vattā, hitānvitattā vacanakkhamo, pāṭhatthavidattā gambhīrakathaṁ kattā, amaccharattā na cāṭṭhāne niyojako iti –
atk-s0515a0:47_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṁ kattā, no cāṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:49_0: Tattha dhammagaruttā kathaṁ na paribhavati, ācariyagaruttā kathikaṁ na paribhavati, saddhāpaññādiguṇapaṭimaṇḍitattā attānaṁ na paribhavati, asaṭhāmāyāvittā amatābhimukhattā ca avikkhittacitto bhavati, sumedhattā yoniso manasi karotīti.
atk-s0515a0:50_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
atk-s0515a0:50_2: Na kathaṁ paribhoti, na kathikaṁ paribhoti, na attānaṁ paribhoti, avikkhittacitto dhammaṁ suṇāti ekaggacitto, yoniso manasi karotī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:55_0: Evaṁ vuttappakāraṁ byañjanañca atthañca dassetvā idāni yo atiaggaṁ katvā kathitattā mahāsamuddamahāpathavī viya mahā ca so niddeso cāti mahāniddeso, taṁ mahāniddesaṁ vaṇṇayissāmi.
atk-s0515a0:56_0: Tadetaṁ mahāniddesaṁ atthasampannaṁ byañjanasampannaṁ gambhīraṁ gambhīratthaṁ lokuttarappakāsakaṁ suññatappaṭisaṁyuttaṁ paṭipattimaggaphalavisesasādhanaṁ paṭipattipaṭipakkhapaṭisedhanaṁ yogāvacarānaṁ ñāṇavararatanākarabhūtaṁ dhammakathikānaṁ dhammakathāvilāsavisesahetubhūtaṁ saṁsārabhīrukānaṁ dukkhanissaraṇatadupāyadassanena assāsajananatthaṁ tappaṭipakkhanāsanatthañca gambhīratthānañca anekesaṁ suttantapadānaṁ atthavivaraṇena sujanahadayaparitosajananatthaṁ, tathāgatena arahatā sammāsambuddhena sabbattha appaṭihatasabbaññutaññāṇamahādīpobhāsena sakalajanavitthatamahākaruṇāsinehena veneyyajanahadayagatakilesandhakāravidhamanatthaṁ samujjalitassa saddhammamahāpadīpassa tadadhippāyavikāsanasinehaparisekena pañcavassasahassamaticirasamujjalanamicchatā lokānukampakena satthukappena dhammarājassa dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitaṁ sutvā āyasmā ānando paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle yathāsutameva saṅgahaṁ āropesi.
atk-s0515a0:57_0: So panesa vinayapiṭakaṁ suttantapiṭakaṁ abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpanno, dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṁyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu mahānikāyesu khuddakamahānikāyapariyāpanno, suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthā udānaṁ itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallanti navasu satthusāsanaṅgesu yathāsambhavaṁ gāthaṅgaveyyākaraṇaṅgadvayasaṅgahito.
atk-s0515a0:59_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0515a0:60_0: Dhammabhaṇḍāgārikattherena pañcasu ṭhānesu etadaggaṁ āropitena paṭiññātānaṁ caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassānaṁ bhikkhuto gahitesu dvīsu dhammakkhandhasahassesu anekasatadhammakkhandhasaṅgahito.
atk-s0515a0:60_1: Tassa dve vaggā aṭṭhakavaggo pārāyanavaggo khaggavisāṇasuttañca, ekekasmiṁ vagge soḷasa soḷasa katvā khaggavisāṇasuttañcāti tettiṁsa suttāni kāmasuttādikhaggavisāṇasuttapariyosānāni.
atk-s0515a0:60_2: Evaṁ anekadhā vavatthāpitassa imassa mahāniddesassa anupubbapadatthavaṇṇanaṁ karissāmi.
atk-s0515a0:60_3: Ayañhi mahāniddeso pāṭhato atthato ca uddisantena niddisantena ca sakkaccaṁ uddisitabbo niddisitabbo ca, uggaṇhantenāpi sakkaccaṁ uggaṇhitabbo dhāretabbo ca.
atk-s0515a0:60_5: Gambhīrattā imassa mahāniddesassa lokahitāya loke ciraṭṭhitatthanti.
